metadata.name: Linux Recon Indicators
metadata.comment: Detects events with patterns found in commands used for reconnaissance on linux systems

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -name .htpasswd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -perm -4000 '))))

output.summary: Detects events with patterns found in commands used for reconnaissance on linux systems

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities Reference: https://github.com/sleventyeleven/linuxprivchecker/blob/0d701080bbf92efd464e97d71a70f97c6f2cd658/linuxprivchecker.py
